alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 01 at 2:56PM PDT until April 05 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT AT ELEVATIONS ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 16 to 20 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County at elevations above 4500 feet. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Falling and blowing snow could make travel difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds combined with heavy falling snow may reduce visibility at times to near white out conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
